Wanglaoju:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
Wanglaoju:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

Wanglaoju:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
Wanglaoju:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
Wanglaoju:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

Wanglaoju:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
Wanglaoju:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

Wanglaoju:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
Wanglaoju:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !Wanglaoju:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

Wanglaoju:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
Wanglaoju:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !Wanglaoju:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
